vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Included with: περαίτερος, α, ον,
comparative of πέρα (A), beyond, ὁδοὶ περαίτεραι roads leading farther, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__II adverb περαιτέρω, further, μανθάνειν π. [Refs 5th c.BC+]; ἓν οἷδα κοὐ π. [Refs]; δεινὰ καὶ π. [Refs 5th c.BC+]; βουλυτὸς ἢ π. [Refs]; οὐδὲν ὅ τι οὐ ξυνέβη καὶ ἔτι π. [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__II.2 with genitive, τῶνδε καὶ π. [Refs 5th c.BC+]: absolutely, π. (i.e. τοῦ δέοντος) πεπραγμένα beyond what is fit, too far, [Refs 5th c.BC+] adverb, π. ἄλλων beyond, better than others, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
further, beyond
Some manuscripts list περί (G4012) in place of G6071 at Act.19.39
vocabInfos._es_Definition: adv. más, más específico, más detallado
